Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated video card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Graphics: 2GB dedicated video card

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
